name: Lawn and Order (danflapjax)
description:
Push buckets of water around to resuscitate the dead grass on your lawn.

My first Ludum Dare entry! The version on this page is a slightly enhanced version from later on submission day (improved water sprites and an extra puzzle). If you'd like to play the original, click the download below.

Controls:

Arrow keys or WASD to move, Z to undo, R to restart, and X, Spacebar, or Enter to progress through text
